dcterms:creator: Kamal Sarkar
dcterms:description: SAIL 2017 provides a sentiment classification dataset on Hindi-English code-mixed data that has been split into training, validation, and test sets with 10055, 1256, and 1257 instances, respectively. Every sample has been labeled as positive, negative, or neutral in sentiment.
dcterms:title: SAIL 2017

dcterms:creator: Jeffrey Pennington
Richard Socher
Christopher Manning
dcterms:description: GloVe (6B) is a word representation model that provides global vectors for word representation, used in the context of vocabulary for sentiment analysis.
dcterms:title: GloVe (6B)
